amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: State colleges; president; collection of fees.
amendatorysection.para: The president of each state college shall receive and collect the fees for matriculation, board, room and such other fees as may be payable at such school, and shall disburse the same under direction of the board and according to law.
